code: import React from"react";import"./Todos.css";import Card from"../UI/Card";import TodoList from"./TodoList";import CompletedList from"./CompletedTodoList";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Todos(props){var deleteHandle=function deleteHandle(id){props.deleteHandle(id);};var todoTasksCount=props.items.filter(function(task){return task.status==="To-do";}).length;var completedTasksCount=props.items.filter(function(task){return task.status==="Completed";}).length;var pendingTasksCount=props.items.filter(function(task){return task.status==="Pending";}).length;var todoTasks=props.items.filter(function(task){return task.status==="To-do";});var completedTasks=props.items.filter(function(task){return task.status==="Completed";});var pendingTasks=props.items.filter(function(task){return task.status==="Pending";});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tasks_section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"task",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TodoList,{items:todoTasks,count:todoTasksCount,type:"To-do",deleteHandle:deleteHandle})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"task",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TodoList,{items:pendingTasks,count:pendingTasksCount,type:"In Progress",deleteHandle:deleteHandle})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"task",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CompletedList,{items:completedTasks,count:completedTasksCount,type:"Completed",deleteHandle:deleteHandle})})]});}export default Todos;
